name: BURNOUT: Innerself
description:
Deep into my mind one travels, to explore the concept of the fabric of my very being.

MAY CONTAIN DEPICTIONS OF MENTAL STRUGGLES

Currently a bit buggy, but with your help someday it will be bug free!

This game was a week long project I took up for myself. It was made with the intention of better understanding myself. It is a flawed game, and riddled with typos, but I put my very heart and soul into it throughout the week. This game took all of me, which I am now displaying for all of you.


PLEASE REPORT ANY TYPOS TO ME!
